SELECT TO_CHAR(B.DT, 'DY') AS ORDER_DATE , NVL(SUM(A.ORDER_COUNT), 0) AS ORDER_COUNT , NVL(SUM(A.ORDER_TOTALPRICE), 0) AS ORDER_TOTALPRICE FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE , COUNT(*) AS ORDER_COUNT , SUM(ORDER_TOTALPRICE) AS ORDER_TOTALPRICE FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 1 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 8 GROUP BY ORDER_DATE ) A , (SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 1 + LEVEL - 1 AS DT FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= ((TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 8 ) - (TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') + 1)) ) B WHERE B.DT = A.ORDER_DATE(+) GROUP BY B.DT ORDER BY B.DT

SELECT TO_CHAR(B.DT, 'MM') AS ORDER_DATE , NVL(SUM(A.CNT), 0) CNT FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE , COUNT(*) CNT FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-01-01') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-12-31') GROUP BY ORDER_DATE ) A , (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-01-01') + LEVEL - 1 AS DT FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-12-31') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-01-01')) ) B WHERE B.DT = A.ORDER_DATE(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(B.DT, 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(B.DT, 'MM')

SELECT TO_CHAR(B.DT, 'MM') AS ORDER_DATE , NVL(SUM(A.CNT), 0) CNT FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE , COUNT(*) CNT FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-01-01') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-12-31') GROUP BY ORDER_DATE ) A , (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-01-01') + LEVEL - 1 AS DT FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-12-31') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-01-01')) ) B WHERE B.DT = A.ORDER_DATE(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(B.DT, 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(B.DT, 'MM')
